title: Index Fragmentation Analysis / İndeks Parçalanma Analizi
description: Analyzes index fragmentation and structure metrics

queries.sql: SELECT owner, index_name, table_name, num_rows, blevel, leaf_blocks FROM dba_indexes WHERE owner IN ('GL', 'AR', 'AP', 'PO', 'APPS') AND num_rows > 10000 ORDER BY blevel DESC FETCH FIRST 30 ROWS ONLY

doc_hint: Shows index metrics. High BLEVEL (> 4) indicates deep index trees. Fragmentation degrades performance and rebuilding may help.
analysis_prompt: Analyze index structure. Report: (1) indexes with high BLEVEL, (2) large leaf_block counts, (3) recommend rebuilding for performance.
